org.cove.jade.surfaces
Interface Surface

All Known Implementing Classes:
CircleTile, LineSurface, RectangleTile
public interface Surface

Class interface for a surface. This is something that primitives/particles can collide with. Note that anything that a primitive/particle can collide with must implement a surface, at the moment the only surfaces in JADE are tiles (which are fixed to the world).
